email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I wanted to give you a quick update on our project:

• All milestones to date have been met on schedule.
• The new algorithm has been fully integrated into the trading platform and is currently in final testing.
• No significant issues have been reported by the dev or QA teams.
• Next steps (late May):
  – Finalize user documentation
  – Prepare training materials
  – Conduct the client workshop

Let me know if you have any questions or need additional details.

Best,
[Your Name]
